stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: London awaits you on 14-15 September for the most exciting SRE event of the year! Be part of a two-day tech extravaganza with over 50+ talks. Don't miss your chance, book your early bird tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 London awaits you on 14-15 September for the most exciting SRE event of the year! Be part of a two-day tech extravaganza with over 50+ talks. Don't miss your chance, book your early bird tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: Your chatbot isn't always right
stories.Description: Hallucinations are a common headache for users trying to get work done with generative AI systems. The industry recognizes the need for improvements, but many doubt that they will suffice.
stories.Tweet: Your chatbot isn't always right 📦 Hallucinations are a common headache for users trying to get work done with generative AI systems. The industry recognizes the need for improvements, but many doubt that they will suffice. #ai https://apnews.com/article/artificial-intelligence-hallucination-chatbots-chatgpt-falsehoods-ac4672c5b06e6f91050aa46ee731bcf4

stories.Title: The fight against image manipulation
stories.Description: Researchers at MIT CSAIL have developed "PhotoGuard," an AI tool that detects invisible perturbations in images, aimed at protecting against malicious manipulation attempts.
stories.Tweet: The fight against image manipulation 📦 Researchers at MIT CSAIL have developed "PhotoGuard," an AI tool that detects invisible perturbations in images, aimed at protecting against malicious manipulation attempts. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/mit-csail-unveils-photoguard-an-ai-defense-against-unauthorized-image-manipulation/

stories.Title: AI solutions from Dell
stories.Description: The company has introduced its generative AI solutions portfolio. In collaboration with Nvidia, Dell plans to assist enterprises in adopting advanced AI technologies for business benefits.
stories.Tweet: AI solutions from Dell 📦 The company has introduced its generative AI solutions portfolio. In collaboration with Nvidia, Dell plans to assist enterprises in adopting advanced AI technologies for business benefits. #dell https://venturebeat.com/ai/dell-and-nvidia-join-forces-for-next-gen-generative-ai-solutions/

stories.Title: Meta is launching AI “personas”
stories.Description: By introducing chatbots with distinct personalities on Facebook and Instagram, Meta aims to enhance user experiences and position itself against competitors in the AI landscape.
stories.Tweet: Meta is launching AI “personas” 📦 By introducing chatbots with distinct personalities on Facebook and Instagram, Meta aims to enhance user experiences and position itself against competitors in the AI landscape. #meta https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/1/23815287/meta-ai-persona-generative-llama-instagram-facebook

stories.Title: Google's Assistant gets revamped
stories.Description: With the goal of creating a more intuitive experience and reshaping its Assistant's functionality. Google is embracing generative AI technologies, as seen in ChatGPT and its own Bard chatbot.
stories.Tweet: Google's Assistant gets revamped 📦 With the goal of creating a more intuitive experience and reshaping its Assistant's functionality. Google is embracing generative AI technologies, as seen in ChatGPT and its own Bard chatbot. #google https://www.axios.com/2023/07/31/google-assistant-artificial-intelligence-news

stories.Title: This is an AI-Generated post
stories.Description: Meta is currently developing generative AI features for Instagram that allow users to identify images created by Meta AI, representing a significant move toward promoting responsible AI practices.
stories.Tweet: This is an AI-Generated post 📦 Meta is currently developing generative AI features for Instagram that allow users to identify images created by Meta AI, representing a significant move toward promoting responsible AI practices. #instagram https://www.engadget.com/instagram-seems-to-be-working-on-labels-for-posts-generated-by-meta-ai-173427549.html

stories.Title: Youtube’s AI-powered insights
stories.Description: The platform is now integrating AI-generated summaries into English videos, providing users with a brief but valuable insight into the content.
stories.Tweet: Youtube’s AI-powered insights 📦 The platform is now integrating AI-generated summaries into English videos, providing users with a brief but valuable insight into the content. #youtube https://www.androidpolice.com/youtube-experiment-ai-video-summary/

stories.Title: The doctor will chat with you now
stories.Description: Amazon's virtual health clinic, Amazon Clinic, has expanded its availability across the US, allowing users to connect with healthcare providers for common conditions through video or text message.
stories.Tweet: The doctor will chat with you now 📦 Amazon's virtual health clinic, Amazon Clinic, has expanded its availability across the US, allowing users to connect with healthcare providers for common conditions through video or text message. #amazon https://www.cnbc.com/2023/08/01/amazon-rolls-out-its-virtual-health-clinic-nationwide.html

stories.Title: Euclid begins its journey!
stories.Description: The ESA's space telescope has embarked on its mission to explore dark matter and dark energy, sending back its initial test images that showcase the wonders of the night sky.
stories.Tweet: Euclid begins its journey! 📦 The ESA's space telescope has embarked on its mission to explore dark matter and dark energy, sending back its initial test images that showcase the wonders of the night sky. #ESA https://interestingengineering.com/science/esas-euclid-space-telescope-first-test-images-cosmos

stories.Title: A watery defense against Starship's thrust
stories.Description: SpaceX has revealed stunning footage of their new water deluge system, designed to protect the launchpad from the immense heat and force of Starship.
stories.Tweet: A watery defense against Starship's thrust 📦 SpaceX has revealed stunning footage of their new water deluge system, designed to protect the launchpad from the immense heat and force of Starship. #spacex https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/spacex-test-water-deluge-system-starship-launches/

title: Google's Assistant gets a makeover, Dell's AI solutions, Meta's "personas" is coming soon
description: We couldn’t avoid having a mix of AI news for today. It seems that all the big names in the field are trying to keep up with the AI race. From Google to Meta and even Dell, there’s not a place that doesn't get a bit of artificial intelligence's magical touch.
